attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should be made to pay back the "expenses" fiddled from the tax payer. "Working within the rules" is no excuse; You all knew it was unethical and if you did not you should not be MPs. Whatever you might call it, in the real world it is stealing.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
